question: Who launches POSOCO-IMD Weather Portal for Power Sector & Web Portal 'MERIT'?
explanation: Union Minister for Power, Coal New & Renewable Energy Shri Piyush Goyal and Mines launches Weather Portal for Power Sector in association with POSOCO and IMD at the meeting of the Forum of Regulators. Day to day weather variations have an impact on load demand and energy production, transport and distribution management, as well as energy prices.
